New Records: Darius Garland scored 40 points in the game
Key Match Events: The Raptors took a lead into the fourth quarter before losing 132-126
Pre-Game Insights: The Cavaliers rested their scoring leader Donovan Mitchell
Post-Match Reflections: The Raptors fought tooth and nail but couldn't hold the lead
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Raptors hit nine three-pointers in the first half on eight fewer attempts than the Cavaliers
Others: This was the first time the Raptors led after a quarter since December 22
